original_title: Redemption - Frozen In The Moment: Live in Atlanta
overview: DVD performance from the Los Angeles-based Progressive Metal band led by guitarist/songwriter Nicolas van Dyk and featuring vocal legend Ray Alder of Fates Warning. The DVD contains a five-camera, high-definition shoot of the band's ProgPower USA VIII festival appearance in Atlanta, Georgia in October 2007. In addition, there is a 12-minute video and photo tour diary.
title: Redemption - Frozen In The Moment: Live in Atlanta
